meanings.sent1: She misanalyses the data and reaches the wrong conclusion.
meanings.sent2: It is easy to misanalyse the situation without all the facts.
meanings.sent3: He misanalyses the recipe and ends up with a strange dish.
meanings.sent4: Don't misanalyse the map or you might get lost.
meanings.sent5: The detective's misanalysis led to the wrong suspect being arrested.

meanings.sent1: They misanalyse his intentions and think he is being rude.
meanings.sent2: It is common to misanalyse someone's tone in text messages.
meanings.sent3: She misanalyses the joke and ends up laughing at the wrong part.
meanings.sent4: Don't misanalyse his silence as agreement.
meanings.sent5: Misanalysing body language can lead to misunderstandings.
